name: NSRelationshipDescription
desc: An object that describes a relationship between two entities.

items.name: var inverseRelationship: NSRelationshipDescription?
items.desc: The relationship that represents the inverse of the current relationship.

items.name: var destinationEntity: NSEntityDescription?
items.desc: The type of object the relationship contains.

items.name: var isOrdered: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the relationship preserves the order of the referenced managed objects.

items.name: var isToMany: Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the relationship can contain many managed objects.

items.name: var minCount: Int
items.desc: The minimum number of managed objects the relationship can reference.

items.name: var maxCount: Int
items.desc: The maximum number of managed objects the relationship can reference.

items.name: var deleteRule: NSDeleteRule
items.desc: The rule to apply when you delete the relationship’s owning managed object.

items.name: enum NSDeleteRule
items.desc: Constants that determine what happens when you delete a relationship’s owning managed object.
